communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Connecticut Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Copies of any and all records held by the town regarding the Colchester almshouse in the 1800s and early 1900s. These records should include, but are not limited to, historical records, Census records, death records, blueprints, receipts, donation slips, letters, photographs, etc. 

For clarity, the Colchester almshouse was once located in the current location of the William J. Johnson Middle School. It was a poorhouse, also called the town farm, which provided charitable housing.

I also request that, if possible and pursuant to Conn. Gen. Stat. § 1-212(d), fees be waived as I believe this request is in the public interest and not made for commercial gain. The requested documents will be made available to the public at MuckRock.com.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 4 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Alexa Gagosz

title: FCC Complaints towards Damar Hamlin situation

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: FCC Complaints towards Damar Hamlin situation
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Complaints related to the NFL game which was played by the Buffalo Bills and the Cincinnati Bengals on January 2nd, 2023, from the time period January 2nd 2023 to January 10th 2023- Broadcasted by ESPN.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Alessandro Guzman

title: Complaints regarding the presidential debate on September 10, 2024

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Complaints regarding the presidential debate on September 10, 2024
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am searching for records of all complaints submitted to the Federal Communications Commission relating to the presidential debate held between Kamala Harris and Donald Trump which aired on September 10, 2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.
